title: New: Purity Ring – Obedear
body:
It’s a true testament to just how far dreampop duo **Purity Ring** have come that when they announced new track _Obedear_ earlier this morning, it almost immediately began trending on Twitter.

With their debut LP _**Shrines**_ out 24 July on [4AD](http://4ad.com/), anticipation is guaranteed to only increase from here on out, especially if they maintain the level of quality that _Obedear_ portrays. A swirling, majestic track, **Purity Ring** may well prove to be the most important dreampop group since **Cocteau Twins**.
